rows.label: qev014002_MSG0001
rows.name: Damned monster! Why won't you die?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0002
rows.name:
Huh? You're a BLADE? Damn!
I thought I'd have more time...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0003
rows.name:
L-look, all I did was stop that traitor from selling all
of us out to the xenos.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0004
rows.name:
We don't aim to hurt any other humansâ€”we're trying
to PROTECT them! Don't you see that?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0005
rows.name:
So please, let me go. I'm in no position to deal with
you right now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell him his actions are wrong no matter the reasons.

rows.label: qev014002_SEL0021
rows.name: Question him to find out who ordered the hit.

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0007
rows.name: That just means I've got one more monster to take out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0008
rows.name:
I've got one bullet for you, traitor, and that's all I'm
going to need.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0009
rows.name: So you want a name, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0010
rows.name:
Well, there's no point in telling you anyway,
since you're about to die.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev014002_MSG0011
rows.name:
That monster can wait its turn. I've got a bullet here
for you, assimilationist dog![ST:wait ]
